asis added)
This example further demonstrates the problematic nature of the LSA’s ad-
missions system. Even if student C’s “extraordinary artistic talent” rivaled
that of Monet or Picasso, the applicant would receive, at most, five points
under the LSA’s system. At the same time, every single underrepresented
minority applicant, including students A and B, would automatically receive
20 points for submitting an application. Clearly, the LSA’s system does not
offer applicants the individualized s
